dmca.title: JustJen's Ire Sparked by RhinestoneTShirts
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam,

This is a notification of copyright infringement per the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

I am the owner of Just Jen, Inc and its website at www.justjen.com. Enclosed is a cease and desist letter mailed to the owners of www.rhinestonetshirts.com and www.rhinestonetshirts.net, on January 31, 2007. We request that Google remove the offending sites from the search engine indexes and remove any advertising links to the sites, per your policies at http://www.google.com/dmca.html and the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

Our website is a retailer of products which we design and manufacture in Los Angeles. The infringement includes use of our copyrighted photographs and text on a total of 16 pages. Each of these infringements is listed below:

1. The copyrighted works at issue are the original photographic images that appear on the following pages on our site at www.justjen.com. Each of these photographic images depicts a unique product design created by Jennifer Smith, founder of JustJen.com. Each photograph was created in Photoshop by Lawrence Smith, as a composite of a blank shirt photograph and a close-up photograph of the shirt design. Upon your request, to further demonstrate our ownership of said designs and photographs, we can provide layered photographs and close-up images of the copyrighted photographs listed below:

Copyrighted Pages:
http://www.justjen.com/Product/initial_tshirt.htm
http://www.justjen.com/Product/sweet16_tshirt.htm
http://www.justjen.com/Product/birthdaygirl_tshirt.htm
http://www.justjen.com/Product/girlsprincess_tshirt.htm
http://www.justjen.com/Product/bachelorette_shirt.htm
http://www.justjen.com/Product/soontobe_tshirt.htm
http://www.justjen.com/Product/heart_panty.htm
http://www.justjen.com/Product/mrs_panty.htm
http://www.justjen.com/Product/bride_panty.htm
http://www.justjen.com/Product/ilove_tshirt.htm

1.Also at issue is text from our web page http://www.justjen.com/whyjj.htm, written by, Lawrence Smith, an employee of JustJen.com, approximately 3 years ago, with minor updates/ revisions since that time.


2.	The infringing web pages on www.rhinestonetshirts.com and http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net are listed below. Each of these pages includes one or more of our photographs and product designs.

Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.rhinestonetshirts.com/
http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/
http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/Personalized-T-Shirts/Personalized-T-Shirts.htm http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/Bridal-T-Shirts/Bridal-T-Shirts.htm http://rhinestonetshirts.net/Custom-Bridal-Lingerie/Custom-Bridal-Lingerie.htm http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/newindex.php?action=product&id=6 http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/newindex.php?action=product&id=61
http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/newindex.php?action=product&id=64 http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/newindex.php?action=product&id=70 http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/newindex.php?action=product&id=104
http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/newindex.php?action=product&id=121 http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/newindex.php?action=product&id=122
http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/newindex.php?action=product&id=179 http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/newindex.php?action=product&id=180 http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/newindex.php?action product&id=181

The web page infringing upon our original text is: http://www.rhinestonetshirts.net/five_reasons.php


The offending websites were found by using the following search queries, among numerous others:

Search Query:	rhinestone t shirt
Infringing Web Pages: www.rhinestonetshirts.com

Search Query:	bridal crystal t shirt
Infringing Web Page: www.rhinestonetshirts.com

Search Query:	rhinestone tshirts
Infringing Web Page(s): www.rhinestonetshirts.com

Search Query:	initial t shirt:
Infringing Web Page(s): www.rhinestonetshirts.com

3.	You may contact us at:

Just Jen, Inc.
[private]
Rolling Hills Estates, CA 90274
[private]
[private]@justjen.com

4.	We believe the owner of the offending sites, rhinestonetshirts.com and rhinestonetshirts.net may be contacted at contact@rhinestonetshirts.net. We also believe the owner of the site may be contacted at:

[private]
[private]
Boca Raton, FL 33486
Phone: [private]
Fax: [private]

5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,


[private]

cc:removals @google.com (via electronic mail)



PHILLIPS, ERLEWINE & GIVEN LLP
ATTORNEYS AT LAW
ONE EMBARCADERO CENTER. 23rd FLOOR
SAN FRANCISCO. CALIFORNIA 94111
TELEPHONE (415) 398-0900
FAX (415) 398-0911
WWW.PHILLAW.COM


January 31, 2007


BY U.S. MAIL AND EMAIL

[private]
[private]
Boca Raton, FL 33486

Re: Just Jen, Inc.

Dear [private]:

We represent Just Jen, Inc., the owner of all rights in and to the website www.justjen.com together with the photographs, text, designs, and merchandise appearing therein.

Our client recently learned that you are publishing its photographic images and text and selling imitations of its merchandise without its authorization or consent on your websites www.rhinestonetshirts.com and www.rhinestonetshirts.net.

Please be advised that you and any and all of your affiliates and agents must immediately cease and desist from using any of our client's materials in any manner whatsoever. This includes, among other things, use of Just Jen's copyrighted photographs and text on your websites. In addition, you must not reproduce, distribute, sell, or traffic in any merchandise bearing Just Jen's designs or confusingly similar facsimiles thereof.

Please forward all merchandise embodying Just Jen's designs or fascimiles thereof together with all advertising and promotional materials depicting or otherwise relating to Just Jen's products to this office for destruction, and delete all advertisements and references to Just Jen's text, photographs, and the merchandise depicted therein from your website. Failure to do so may subject you to additional liability for significant monetary damages, attorney's fees and costs, as well as injunctive relief.

Please contact us, or have your counsel contact us, promptly if you desire an amicable resolution of this matter. In any event, we expect the following by the close of business Thursday, February 8, 2007:

(1) Written assurances that you have complied with this request, and have not or are no longer displaying Just Jen's photographs and text or selling imitations of Just Jen's products.

(2) A full accounting of all revenues, from merchandise sales or otherwise, generated from the display of Just Jen's photographs and text, the sale of imitations of Just Jen's products, and the use of Just Jen's designs.

This letter does not constitute a full recitation of the known facts or law, and our client expressly reserves any and all of its rights and remedies in this matter.

Very truly yours,


[private], Esq.

[private]

cc:	Client (by US mail)
